titleStmt.title: The mistaken beauty, or, The lyar a comedy, acted by Their Majesties servants at the Royal Theatre.
Menteur. English
titleStmt.author: Corneille, Pierre, 1606-1684.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Attributed to Pierre Corneille. cf. NUC pre-1956.
An anonymous translation of Corneille's "Le menteur".
